heading: HR02255
0: A RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PHILIPPINES' CONTINUED RELIANCE ON IMPORTED AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTS IN LIEU OF THE LATEST USDA FOREIGN AGRICULTURAL SERVICE (FAS) REPORT REVEALING THAT THE COUNTRY IS EXPECTED TO IMPORT MORE PORK AND CHICKEN MEAT TO MEET INCREASING DEMANDS, WITH THE  GOAL OF CHARTING THE NECESSARY LEGISLATIONS TO ENHANCE FOOD SECURITY AND SELF-SUFFICIENCY
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-11-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02255
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PHILIPPINES' CONTINUED RELIANCE ON IMPORTED AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTS IN LIEU OF THE LATEST USDA FOREIGN AGRICULTURAL SERVICE (FAS) REPORT REVEALING THAT THE COUNTRY IS EXPECTED TO IMPORT MORE PORK AND CHICKEN MEAT TO MEET INCREASING DEMANDS, WITH THE GOAL OF CHARTING THE NECESSARY LEGISLATIONS TO ENHANCE FOOD SECURITY AND SELF-SUFFICIENCY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-17
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-11-12
